trans-unit.source: Defines custom placement parameters for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 사용자 지정 배치 매개 변수를 정의 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The CustomPopupPlacement structure defines a location for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control with respect to its parent, and defines how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> moves to become more visible when it is obscured by a screen boundary.
trans-unit.target: CustomPopupPlacement 구조 정의 대 한 위치는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>해당 부모와 관련 하 여 제어 하 고 정의 방법을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>화면 경계에서 가려져 때 더 잘 표시 되도록 이동 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback?displayProperty=fullName> delegate returns an array of these structures as custom placement options for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback?displayProperty=fullName>대리자 반환 이러한 구조의 배열에 대 한 사용자 지정 배치 옵션은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> 속성이</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"> </xref> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that is relative to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*> where the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> is placed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> 기준으로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>여기서의 왼쪽 위 모서리는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> 배치 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PopupPrimaryAxis"></xref> along which a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control moves when it is obstructed by a screen edge.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PopupPrimaryAxis"> </xref> 기준는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> 때가 려 지 화면 가장자리로 이동 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Compares this structure with another <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"></xref> structure to determine whether they are equal.
trans-unit.target: 이 구조를 다른 비교 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"> </xref> 같은지 여부를 결정 하는 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"></xref> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"> </xref> 비교할 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the structures have the same values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>구조; 동일한 값이 있는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for this structure.
trans-unit.target: 이 구조에 대 한 해시 코드를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this structure.
trans-unit.target: 이 구조에 대 한 해시 코드입니다.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"></xref> structures to determine whether they are equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"> </xref> 같은지 여부를 결정 하는 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"></xref> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"> </xref> 비교할 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"></xref> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 두 번째 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"> </xref> 비교할 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the structures have the same values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>구조; 동일한 값이 있는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"></xref> structures to determine whether they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"> </xref> 같지 않은지 여부를 결정 하는 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"></xref> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"> </xref> 비교할 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"></xref> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: 두 번째 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"> </xref> 비교할 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the structures do not have the same values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>구조는 동일한 값을 사용 하지 않은 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the point that is relative to the target object where the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control is placedl.
trans-unit.target: 대상 개체를 기준으로 사용 되는 지점을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. 여기서의 왼쪽 위 모서리는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> 컨트롤은 모퉁이가 배치 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The target object is the element that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is relative to.
trans-unit.target: 대상 개체는 요소는는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>기준으로 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [팝업 배치 동작](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that is used to position a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> 위치를 지정 하는 데 사용 되는 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is (0,0).

Gets or sets the direction in which to move a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> is obscured by screen boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 이동 방향을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> 시점을 제어할는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> 화면 경계에서 가려집니다.

trans-unit.source: The direction in which to move a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> is obscured by screen boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 이동 방향을 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> 시점을 제어할는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"> </xref> 화면 경계에서 가려집니다.
